inclusion.criterion: patient able to read and understand an English language self-administered questionnaire
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: interstitial cystitis or chronic urethral or bladder pain
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: urinary retention defined as a post void residual >120cc

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or planning pregnancy within the next 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: dementia or inability to complete questionnaires
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, but currently stable with good urine output. Urology suggested surgical fixation for severe urethral stricture when patient is stable.
